attributes.additional_details: Primary school children have missed almost a year of learning. No real tuition has been given by schools during this time, therefore how can they be expected to confidently perform in a test that directly impacts their future. This stressful period has impacted their mental health, as they watch the world they are familiar drastically change.
attributes.background: Cancel Year 6 Primary SATs tests for 2021

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/326486
